title: Online Learning Environment Design and Learner Engagement Enhancement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Aimed at pre-service teachers/in-service teachers, the goal is to develop strategies for designing online learning environments and enhancing learner engagement during social studies projects

learning_goals: They can design and implement three strategies to maintain learner engagement above 80% through project-based activities in online learning environments
They can develop at least two participatory learning modules considering limited technological environments (smartphone-centric)
They can create and apply at least one rubric that measures learner performance with a focus on summative assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
